All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Column
The Column class represents a column in a database table.
GeneratorFactory
The GeneratorFactory class is responsible for creating instances of SchemaGenerator based on the specified database format.
JsonParser
The JsonParser class is responsible for parsing JSON schema files and converting them into a SchemaModel object.
OracleGenerator
Implementation of SchemaGenerator that generates SQL scripts for Oracle databases.
ParserFactory
Factory class to create instances of SchemaParser based on the input format.
Relationship
The Relationship class represents a relationship between database tables.
SchemaController
The SchemaController class serves as the controller in the MVC architecture, managing the interaction between the SchemaModel and the SchemaView.
SchemaGenerator
Interface for schema generators that produce SQL scripts based on schema models.
SchemaModel
The SchemaModel class represents the data model for a database schema.
SchemaParser
The SchemaParser interface defines the contract for parsing schema files into a SchemaModel.
SchemaParsingException
The SchemaParsingException class represents a custom exception that is thrown when an error occurs during the parsing of a schema file.
SchemaRunner
The SchemaRunner class serves as the entry point for the Schema application.
SchemaView
The SchemaView class represents the user interface for displaying and interacting with the schema.
SqlGenerator
Implementation of SchemaGenerator that generates SQL scripts for creating tables and managing relationships in databases.
Table
The Table class represents a database table in a schema.
XMLParser
The XMLParser class is responsible for parsing XML schema files and converting them into a SchemaModel object.
